name: The Legend of GEML: Awakening
description:
Legend of Zelda inspired puzzle game. There is an overworld implemented with two dungeons. This game was built for the WASM4 game jam.

PLEASE READ:
- Go down for the first easier dungeon and up for the second harder dungeon
- You can exit and reenter a room to reset the puzzle in the case of a unsolvable configuration or mistake 
- Have FUN!

Source code:
Game Source: https://github.com/restitux/spectral-control

Python Map Data Generator: https://github.com/restitux/w4-tiled-converter
